properties.name: Lightbox Espresso & Wine Bar
properties.description:
An espresso and wine bar with a unique drink offering and progressive food menu to match.
Located at the entrance to Gladstone’s recently re-developed entertainment precinct,
Lightbox is the perfect spot for a pre-show drink, lazy weekend breakfast, or chilled Sunday session enjoying live music in the garden or courtyard.

properties.name: Gladstone Reef Hotel
properties.description:
Freshly renovated, Gladstone Reef Hotel’s a La Carte bistro offers modern Australian cuisine and seats 120 people in air-conditioned comfort.
Offering nightly dinner specials, we also offer Chefs’ specials daily for lunch and dinner.
Dine in our comfortable restaurant or enjoy your meal while watching the sunset over Gladstone Harbour from our beautiful deck.

properties.name: Oak and Vine at the Oaks Grand Hotel
properties.description:
Sporting a fresh, bright and leafy interior, Oak & Vine is the place to go for traditional hotel bistro meals, including a range of chicken schnitzels, classic fish and chips, pasta dishes and great chargrilled steaks.
Oak & Vine also features a bar which boasts your favourite draught beers, Australian and New Zealand wines and cocktails to enjoy with your meal, after work or just on a night out with friends.

properties.name: The Grand Coffee Club
properties.description:
The Coffee Club provides quality coffee and premium meal choices in a casual atmosphere. Sit back and sip on a expertly brewed coffee made from premium coffee beans, while you enjoy a tasty meal with colleagues, friends or when needing a delicious feed on the go.

properties.name: McDonalds Gladstone City
properties.description: Open 24 hrs

properties.name: Gladstone Yacht Club Restaurant and Bar
properties.description:
The Gladstone Yacht Club was designed to take full advantage of its exceptional location.
The Captain’s Deck and New Veranda offer beautiful water and sunset views, a constant sea breeze and a perfect place to wine, dine or relax & unwind.
Offering an extensive A la Carte menu Restaurant Menu available for lunch from 11:30am to 2pm and Dinner from 5pm-8pm, all with Gluten Free options (available on request).

properties.name: Gladstone Fish Market Hot Box
properties.description: Fish and chips is what makes our world go around. Fresh Reef fish and chips. NOTE: Closed Tuesdays

properties.name: Fifi's Kebabs
properties.description:
Come here for some rest after a long walk around Gladstone Entertainment Convention Centre. Turkish cuisine will be what you are offered to taste at this restaurant.
Kebas, gozeleme, halal snack packs
[X] Vegetarian [] Vegan [] Gluten Friendly [] Dairy Free

properties.name: Thai Classic
properties.description:
Thai Classic Restaurant, a renowned and fully licensed establishment nestled in the heart of Gladstone, specializes in authentic Thai cuisine, featuring a spectrum of traditional Thai dishes.
From the ever-popular Thai Green Curry and Pad Thai to an exquisite assortment like the savoury beef salad, the restaurant offers a diverse selection to cater to various tastes.

properties.name: Thai Basement
properties.description:
Indulge in the magnificent exotic spices and aromas of Thai cuisine at Thai-Basement, where you can enjoy a memorable dining experience for lunch, dinner, or takeaway.
Immerse yourself in our relaxed and casual setting, complemented by the inviting atmosphere of our licensed bar.

properties.name: Central Lane Hotel
properties.description: Hotel bistro, pub grub

properties.name: Woolworths Gladstone Valley
properties.description: Groceries, fresh food if you want to make your own food

properties.name: Subway
properties.description: Footlong sandwiches and wraps

properties.name: Ward's brewery
properties.description: Beer, burgers and wings

properties.name: Flavourin International Groceries
properties.description: Indian, Pakistani, Bangladeshi and Sri Lankan groceries

properties.name: The Queens Gladstone
properties.description:
Steakhouse and pizza, sports-bar style.
[X] Vegetarian [] Vegan [X] Gluten Friendly [X] Dairy Free

properties.name: Familia Restaurant and Cafe Gelati
properties.description:
The aroma of crema delightfully lures your towards La Familia. Service is superb, friendly and quick. Lovely atmosphere and ambience, welcomed as if your are la familia.
Venue is homely and clean and begs you to come in, relax and enjoy. Inside and outside verandah dining with the most fabulous water view.
Delightful and various delectable brekky, lunch, drinks, (hot, cold and alcoholic as well as ice cream and gelato available.
A must to experience whilst in Gladstone.

properties.name: Cafe Spinnaker Park
properties.description: Located in picturesque Spinnaker Park. Great place for breakfast (from 7am) and brunch.

properties.name: Fresh Fix
properties.description:
Tim is a qualified chef, T.A.F.E. Teacher and a graduate of Southern Cross University with a Diploma of Food Service Management – the first person in Australia to do so.
Janene has extensive experience in dietetics within the hospitals but her forte is front of house hospitality with extensive barista skills and knowledge with exemplary customer care.
Together we have owned and operated 4 previous businesses on the Gold Coast and to date Fresh Fix is the busiest one thus far.
What makes Fresh Fix Café such a success – location, food, service, staff and café ambience.

properties.name: Ichi Maki
properties.description:
Gladstone Ichimaki will provide a range of sushi options from nori, nigiri, sashimi, bento boxes, salads and Teppanyaki. Tuck into our scrumptious pork and ginger dumplings, slurp up some heart warming ramen soup.
Ichimaki will also cater those taste buds aching for a good Asian stir fry, with our chefs all highly trained and experienced.

properties.name: Sushi hyo
properties.description:
Gladstone Ichimaki will provide a range of sushi options from nori, nigiri, sashimi, bento boxes, salads and Teppanyaki. Tuck into our scrumptious pork and ginger dumplings, slurp up some heart warming ramen soup.
Ichimaki will also cater those taste buds aching for a good Asian stir fry, with our chefs all highly trained and experienced.

properties.name: Rossco's Pizza
properties.description: Rossco's Pizza stands out among residents with its authentic taste and quality ingredients. According to customer reviews, their pizzas are made without processed foods, offering a genuine Italian experience.

properties.name: Dragon Garden Restaurant
properties.description: Dragon Garden Chinese Restaurant is a high quality chinese and Asian cuisine Restaurant located in the heart of Gladstone. we are a dine in, take away shop that also does catering for local businesses and events in the Gladstone CBD area.

properties.name: Chinatown Restaurant
properties.description: When you’re looking for premium-quality Chinese cuisine at prices that don’t hurt the hip pocket, Chinatown Restaurant is the answer. We’re open for both lunch and dinner, offering a massive selection of beef, pork, chicken, seafood, vegetarian and duck dishes. Fill a container with your favourites and take it home, or take a seat and dine in—the choice is yours! We also cater to large groups and functions. For all enquiries or to order takeaway from the menu, call our friendly team today.

properties.name: Young Australian Hotel
properties.description:
The Young Australian bistro captures the modern pub eating aesthetic in an all-inclusive, colourful and accommodating menu, with a separate children's menu.
Our eatery is the local go-to for every occasion. The meals on offer are plentiful and delicious with a selection of entrées, main courses, share plates, pizzas and meals even the youngsters will enjoy.

properties.name: The Club Hotel
properties.description: Our newly renovated bistro is the perfect spot for a bite to eat. Take a seat and tuck into some quality Queensland classics, from fresh seafood to family favourites like the classic parmy, plus a range of steaks to satisfy our amazing locals. You’ll find all your favourites on tap, with a selection of wines from our favourite producers near and far.

properties.name: Auckland House Brewery
properties.description:
With a warm welcome feel and generosity, matched with premium dining areas, enjoy the unique combination of water views,
fresh drinks and great food with the people you love.
A short stroll through East Shores parkland make this a calming walk with great views of the harbour.
